A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If all you want is your version of Star Wars you may really hate this film. If you are open to a new direction for the series then you will have fun and enjoy a really good installment into the Star Wars franchise. The only reason it's not five stars is because I was hoping to see more happen with certain characters. \nI encourage everyone to see it twice just to give yourself a good chance to process everything. All in all the future of Star Wars is bright.
